age.query: case when {age} < 25 then '< 25' when {age} < 45 then '25 - 45' when {age} < 65 then '45 - 65' else '> 65' end [impute 'Missing']

weight.query: case when {weight} < 50 then '< 50' when {weight} < 100 then '50 - 100' when {weight} < 200 then '100 - 200' else '> 200' end [impute 'Missing']

height.query: case when {height} < 150 then '< 150' when {height} < 180 then '150 - 180' else '> 180' end [impute 'Missing']

BMI.query:
case when bmi < 18.5 then 'Underweight'
            when bmi < 25 then 'Healthy Range'
            when bmi < 30 then 'Overweight'
            when bmi < 40 then 'Obese'
            else 'Severely Obese' end with bmi as {weight} / ({height} * {height} / 10000) [impute 'Missing']

GCS Eye Opening.query:
case when last_val < 4 then "Low"
            when last_val > 5 then "High"
            else "Normal" end
            with last_val as last {GCS Eye Opening} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute "Missing"]

Delta GCS Eye Opening.query:
case when change < -0.5 then 'Decreasing'
        when change > 0.5 then 'Increasing'
        else 'No Change' end
        with change as (mean {GCS Eye Opening} from #now - 4 h to #now) - (mean {GCS Eye Opening} from #now - 8 h to #now - 4 h) [impute 'No Change']

GCS Verbal Response.query:
case when last_val < 5 then "Low"
            when last_val > 6 then "High"

        with change as (mean {CO2 Calc} from #now - 4 h to #now) - (mean {CO2 Calc} from #now - 8 h to #now - 4 h) [impute 'No Change']

CVP.query:
case when last_val < 0 then "Low"
            when last_val > 10 then "High"
            else "Normal" end
            with last_val as last {CVP} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute "Missing"]

Delta CVP.query:
case when change < -0.5 then 'Decreasing'
        when change > 0.5 then 'Increasing'
        else 'No Change' end
        with change as (mean {CVP} from #now - 4 h to #now) - (mean {CVP} from #now - 8 h to #now - 4 h) [impute 'No Change']

Tidal Volume.query:
case when ({gender} = "Male" and last_val < 400) or ({gender} = "Female" and last_val < 300) then "Low"
            when ({gender} = "Male" and last_val > 600) or ({gender} = "Female" and last_val > 500) then "High"
            else "Normal" end
            with last_val as last {Tidal Volume} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute "Missing"]

Delta Tidal Volume.query:
case when change < -0.5 then 'Decreasing'
        when change > 0.5 then 'Increasing'
        else 'No Change' end
        with change as (mean {Tidal Volume} from #now - 4 h to #now) - (mean {Tidal Volume} from #now - 8 h to #now - 4 h) [impute 'No Change']

Agitation.query:

            when last_val > 3 then "High"
            else "Normal" end
            with last_val as last {Agitation} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute "Missing"]

        with change as (mean {Agitation} from #now - 4 h to #now) - (mean {Agitation} from #now - 8 h to #now - 4 h) [impute 'No Change']

Heart Rhythm.query: last {Heart Rhythm} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute 'Missing']

O2 Delivery Device.query: last {O2 Delivery Device} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute 'Missing']

Activity.query: last {Activity} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute 'Missing']

Pain Type.query: last {Pain Type} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute 'Missing']

Pain Cause.query: last {Pain Cause} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute 'Missing']

Pain Location.query: last {Pain Location} from #now - 4 h to #now [carry 8 hours, impute 'Missing']

Isotonic Crystalloid.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum amount {Isotonic Crystalloid} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'Missing']

Hypotonic Crystalloid.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum amount {Hypotonic Crystalloid} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'Missing']

Hypertonic Crystalloid.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum amount {Hypertonic Crystalloid} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'Missing']

Isotonic Colloid.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum amount {Isotonic Colloid} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'Missing']

Blood Products.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum amount {Blood Products} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'Missing']

Urine.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum {Urine} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute '< 100 mL']

Non-Urine Fluid.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end with fluid as sum {Non-Urine Fluid} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute '< 100 mL']

Input Last 24 h.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end 
                              with fluid as ((sum amount {Isotonic Crystalloid, Hypotonic Crystalloid, Hypertonic Crystalloid, Isotonic Colloid, Blood Products} from #now - 24 h to #now) + (case when #now - {intime} < 24 h then {inputpreadm} else 0 end)) 
                              [impute '< 100 mL']

Output Last 24 h.query:
case when fluid < 100 then '< 100 mL'
                              when fluid < 500 then '100 - 500 mL'
                              when fluid < 1000 then '500 - 1000 mL'
                              when fluid < 5000 then '1 - 5 L'
                              else '> 5 L' end 
                              with fluid as ((sum {Urine, Non-Urine Fluid} from #now - 24 h to #now) + (case when #now - {intime} < 24 h then {uopreadm} else 0 end)) 
                              [impute '< 100 mL']

Norepinephrine.query:
case when vaso < 10 then 'None'
                              when vaso <= 10000 then '<= 10 mg/kg'
                              else '> 10 mg/kg' end
                              with vaso as integral rate {Norepinephrine} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'None']

Phenylephrine.query:
case when vaso < 10 then 'None'
                              when vaso <= 10000 then '<= 10 mg/kg'
                              else '> 10 mg/kg' end
                              with vaso as integral rate {Phenylephrine} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'None']

Epinephrine.query:
case when vaso < 10 then 'None'
                              when vaso <= 10000 then '<= 10 mg/kg'
                              else '> 10 mg/kg' end
                              with vaso as integral rate {Epinephrine} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'None']

Dopamine.query:
case when vaso < 10 then 'None'
                              when vaso <= 10000 then '<= 10 mg/kg'
                              else '> 10 mg/kg' end
                              with vaso as integral rate {Dopamine} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'None']

Vasopressin.query:
case when vaso < 0.1 then 'None'
                              when vaso <= 2 * 4 then '<= 2 units/hour'
                              else '> 2 units/hour' end
                              with vaso as integral rate {Vasopressin} from #now - 4 h to #now [impute 'None']

Gout.query: case when p then 'Yes' else 'No' end with p as (exists {Gout} from #now - 4 h to #now) [impute 'No']
